org.jhotdraw.draw.event
Interface CompositeFigureListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface CompositeFigureListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Interface implemented by observers of CompositeFigure.

Design Patterns

Observer
Changes in the composition of a composite figure can be observed.
Subject: CompositeFigure; Observer: CompositeFigureListener; Event: CompositeFigureEvent.

Version:
